channel.title: Poster on Community Over Code Europe
channel.description: Recent content in Poster on Community Over Code Europe

item.title: Recon - Ozone cluster monitoring and observability
item.description: Ozone is a redundant, distributed object store optimized for Big data workloads. The primary design point of ozone is scalability, and it aims to scale to billions of objects. Recon provides monitoring and observability capability, which provides various insights about data in Ozone and cluster health. As part of this, will cover the various insights about data, cluster health monitoring and heat map capability, and various features which help in understanding and observing the data and Ozone.
